title: Marshall Monitor III Active Noise Canceling Over-Ear Bluetooth Headphones
description: Each iconic pair of Marshall headphones is built on over 60 years of mastering the craft of head-turning sound. And Monitor III A.N.C. tops the lot. Every time you hit play, get ready to be fully immersed in thunderous bass and screaming highs. Monitor III A.N.C. also comes equipped with enhanced active noise cancelling technology, and reduced wind noise. It’ll almost feel like it’s only you and your favourite musician in the room, on the street or in the train carriage. With 70 hours of wireless playtime, that’s one legendary private listening session, and 40 hours more than our last model. When you’re ready to let the outside world in on the party, simply switch over to Transparency mode. These features are also matched by chart-topping design. The foldable construction along with the premium hard case mean Monitor III A.N.C. is ready to go whenever you are. They're so wearable we wouldn't be surprised if they became your second skin.
